Name: Team Capacity Limit
Description: Team size and availability should not exceed planned sprint workload

Name: Skill Match for Tasks
Description: Assigned employees must match required skills for tasks

Name: One Role per Employee per Sprint
Description: Each employee should take on a single role per sprint

Name: Task Must Belong to Sprint
Description: Every task must be part of an active sprint

Name: Feature Must Be Documented
Description: All completed features must have documentation

Name: No Overlapping Assignments
Description: An employee cannot work on two tasks at the same time

Name: Certified Scrum Master Required
Description: Each team must be supported by a certified Scrum Master

Name: Availability Threshold
Description: Only employees with >= 80% availability can be assigned critical tasks

Name: Retrospective Participation Required
Description: All team members must attend retrospectives

Name: Feature Priority Alignment
Description: Work should focus on high-priority features first
